title: Store Not Loading
body:
I have restarted my client several times but I am unable to access the store. Whenever I click the Store tab I get a message stating. 

An error has occurred.

An error is preventing your store request from being processed at this time. This issue can typically be resolved by clicking on the store button again to reload the store. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience.


If this problem persists, please contact League of Legends Player Support at support.riotgames.com

If anyone has a fix for this I'd greatly appreciate it!

replies.body: It looks like we were having some NA store issues earlier on today, but since they've been smoothed out. Let me know if you're still having any problems accessing the store though!
Having an issue like this. Though my store is just loading a black screen. Won't load. I've rest, and verified files and all that. Still just a black store. D: Can't buy the pretty things! D':
Came here to write about this. Having this issue I thought it was only me as well. what's going on riot?
